sentence.Network_en: "So what do you think will happen?" he asked eagerly.
sentence.Network_cn: “那么你觉得会发生什么？”他急切地问道。

sentence.Network_en: Lulled into a false sense of security, we eagerly awaited their return.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们被一种虚假的安全感所麻痹，急切地等着他们回来。

sentence.Network_en: Myself when young did eagerly frequent Doctor and Saint.
sentence.Network_cn: 我年轻时的确热心于和圣贤经常来往.

大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... spoon n. 调羹 eagerly ad. 热切地，急切地 occasionally ad. 偶尔；间或.

People were eagerly awaiting the result of the presidential election ., 人们对总统大选的结果拭目以待.
切是什么意思？_百度知道 ... 10. 切脉[ pulse-feeling] 11. 切盼[ expect eagerly] 12. 切迫[ urgent].
Character  - Chinese Character... ... 苛待[ treat harshly] 渴待[ eagerly expect] 留待[ leave sth.to be done later].
farewell ! your alma mater is watching eagerly to see what will become of you ten years from now .再会了！你们的母校眼睁睁地要看你们十年之后成什么器。

entry.def: If you are eager to do or have something, you want to do or have it very much.

example.ex: Robert was eager to talk about life in the Army...
example.tran: 罗伯特很想谈谈陆军生活。

example.ex: When my own son was five years old, I became eager for another baby...
example.tran: 我家儿子5岁的时候，我特别想再要一个孩子。

entry.tran: （看起来或听上去）急切的，期盼的
entry.def: If you look or sound eager, you look or sound as if you expect something interesting or enjoyable to happen.

example.ex: Arty sneered at the crowd of eager faces around him...
example.tran: 阿蒂对他身边那些期盼的面孔嗤之以鼻。

example.ex: Her voice was girlish and eager.
example.tran: 她的声音像个小姑娘似的，而且带着一股急不可耐。

means.word_mean: 1. with eagerness; in an eager manner;

auth_sentence.content: Yet those eagerly anticipated school trips are under threat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet those eagerly anticipated school trips are under threat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet those eagerly anticipated school trips are under threat.

auth_sentence.content: Still, some collectors eagerly seek out female artwork.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, some collectors eagerly seek out female artwork.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, some collectors eagerly seek out female artwork.

auth_sentence.content: The expert leaned forward eagerly and grasped the book.
auth_sentence.res_content: The expert leaned forward eagerly and grasped the book.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The expert leaned forward eagerly and grasped the book.

sentences.en: The President’s visit is eagerly looked forward to.
sentences.cn: 人们热切地盼望总统来访。

sentences.en: She leant forward eagerly to listen to him.
sentences.cn: 她急切地向前弯着腰听他说。

sentences.en: Myself when young did eagerly frequent Doctor and Saint.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时的确热心于和圣贤经常来往。

sentences.en: Her latest novel is eagerly awaited.
sentences.cn: 人们正急切地期待着她的最新小说。

sentences.en: He eagerly requested loan from the bank.
sentences.cn: 他迫切地要求银行给予贷款。

sentences.en: Five hundred pairs of eyes were fastened upon him eagerly.
sentences.cn: 五百双眼睛热切地盯着他。
